=======================================
Setting up how fields will be displayed
=======================================

When we opened the **Tasks** journal in the browser the fields in the table and 
in the edit form were displayed in the order they've been created. To change the 
way the fields are displayed in the table, click on the 
:doc:`View </admin/items/view_fields_dialog>` 
button.

.. image:: /intro/_images/tasks_view.png
	:align: center
	:alt: Tasks view

To change the way the fields are displayed in the edit form click on the 
:doc:`Edit </admin/items/edit_fields_dialog>`
button. 

.. image:: /intro/_images/tasks_edit.png
	:align: center
	:alt: Tasks edit
